entry.def: If someone refers to a woman as a nymphomaniac, they mean that she has sex or wants to have sex much more often than they consider normal or acceptable.

example.ex: Lucia was a known nymphomaniac in Paris in the Thirties.
example.tran: 露西娅是30年代巴黎人人皆知的女色情狂。

means.word_mean: 1. a woman with abnormal sexual desires
1. (used of women) affected with excessive sexual desire

auth_sentence.content: Enjoying alcohol doesn't make you an alcoholic any more than enjoying sex makes you a nymphomaniac.
auth_sentence.res_content: Enjoying alcohol doesn't make you an alcoholic any more than enjoying sex makes you a nymphomaniac.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Enjoying alcohol doesn't make you an alcoholic any more than enjoying sex makes you a nymphomaniac.

auth_sentence.content: Once you are the world's eternal nymphomaniac, you are never again allowed to get dressed.

auth_sentence.content: The nymphomaniac Lady May threatens that she likes being "shown how to do new things".
